content:
on Veterans Day November  several veterans will share powerful poems by other veteran poets from the Civil War to present day as well as their own work PERIOD This is a Zoom event and will be held on Wednesday at  p.m PERIOD

The program title is Veteran Poets Reading Veteran Poets PERIOD They are reading their own poems and poems from others about WWI WWII wars in Korea Vietnam Iraq Afghanistan and the homefront PERIOD

Terry Farish served with the American Red Cross in Cu Chi and Qui Nhon during the war in Vietnam and is a panelist PERIOD Karen Skolfield another panelist speaker is a U.S PERIOD Army veteran and teaches writing to engineers at the University of Massachusetts Amherst PERIOD She is the current poet laureate for Northampton MA PERIOD Kyle Potvin is a part of Home Front and the only nonveteran panelist PERIOD

COVID19 has created new challenges for the entire planet including the poetry industry PERIOD Most if not all events are now virtually coordinated over zoom PERIOD However it has persevered PERIOD Farish said Rodger Martin and Kyle Potvin with Rodney Obien have been key to the organization of this event on a virtual platform PERIOD Weve met many times by Zoom to plan read aloud critique and revise. the full story on this event will be published next Thursday November  PERIOD



Harrison Paletta can be contacted at

hpalettakscequinox.com









Save my name email and website in this browser for the next time I comment PERIOD
